content: Great insights on the future of web development! I'm particularly excited about the potential of WebAssembly.
Asynchronous JavaScript was a game-changer for my projects. Promises and async/await have made handling asynchronous operations so much cleaner.
Hooks in React are really powerful. I've found them much easier to use compared to class-based components.
Python's simplicity and the vast array of libraries available make it perfect for data science. Great overview of its capabilities.
Machine learning is definitely an area I'm looking to explore more. This article was a helpful starting point.
